text: Stephen Whitefield Sykes (1 August 1939 â€“ 25 September 2014) was the Church of England Bishop of Ely and held professorial chairs in divinity at both Durham University and Cambridge University. He retired as Principal of St John's College, Durham at the end of August 2006. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Durham Category:Academics of the University of Cambridge Category:Church of England bishops
